name: Slot Machine Simulator tutorial for Playdate Pulpscript
name_original: Slot Machine Simulator tutorial for Playdate Pulpscript
description:
Hello there. This is a tutorial project I'm working on for the Playdate using the free online game creation software called Pulp. This is unfinished as I might add some animations and adjust the difficulty, but this prerelease is available with the source code. This project is intended to teach people how to make their own slot-machine via Pulpscript

Note: The source-code has comments, but they maybe inaccurate as I replaced a bunch of code

https://play.date.pulp
